typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		FacultyNo as integer,
		FacultyName as string,
		Gender as string,
		Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	purgeFiles: true) ~> sourceFaculty
source(output(
		SurrKey as integer,
		FacultyNo as integer,
		FacultyName as string,
		Gender as string,
		Department as string,
		isactive as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sourceFacultyTable
sourceFaculty derive(Isactive = 1) ~> DerivedColumn1
sourceFacultyTable select(mapColumn(
		SQL_SurrKey = SurrKey,
		SQL_FacultyNo = FacultyNo,
		SQL_FacultyName = FacultyName,
		SQL_Gender = Gender,
		SQL_Department = Department,
		SQL_isactive = isactive
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ChangeColumnName
sourceFaculty, ChangeColumnName lookup(FacultyNo == SQL_FacultyNo,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 filter(!isNull(SQL_FacultyNo)) ~> FilterFacultyNo
FilterFacultyNo select(mapColumn(
		SQL_SurrKey,
		SQL_FacultyNo,
		SQL_FacultyName,
		SQL_Gender,
		SQL_Department,
		SQL_isactive
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveUnnecesoryColumns
RemoveUnnecesoryColumns derive(SQL_isactive = 0) ~> ChangeIsactiveColumn
ChangeIsactiveColumn alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SurrKey as integer,
		FacultyNo as integer,
		FacultyName as string,
		Gender as string,
		Department as string,
		isactive as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		FacultyNo,
		FacultyName,
		Gender,
		Department,
		isactive = Isactive
	)) ~> FacultySink
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SurrKey as integer,
		FacultyNo as integer,
		FacultyName as string,
		Gender as string,
		Department as string,
		isactive as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['SurrKey'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		SurrKey = SQL_SurrKey,
		FacultyNo = SQL_FacultyNo,
		FacultyName = SQL_FacultyName,
		Gender = SQL_Gender,
		Department = SQL_Department,
		isactive = SQL_isactive
	)) ~> sink1
